This webpage was created by <a href="https://lchogal.github.io/cv/">Leslie Hodges Gallagher</a>, granddaughter of Sidney William Stinnett (1911-1971). Research relied on crowd-sourced information from Geni.com, FamilySearch.org, and FindAGrave.com. The current tree, published January 2026, should be considered a working draft while primary historical sources are verified. Family tree diagrams were generated using Python with Graphviz. Supporting files can be found in the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/lchogal/Stinnett_line).
